step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with stretching your arms back overhead. Focus on a smooth exhale as you relax.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this part.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Keep up the good form.
You're consistently performing the repetitions. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and muscle engagement as described.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale and relax as you return your arms overhead.
